name: Duet Cats: Cute Popcat Music
description:
The music world of cute popcat are out now - cat noies. Let's control the hottest popcat duet ever 🐾 Who will be the diva cat in this cats tower?

Duet Cats is the perfect mix between cats funny and cats meowing sounds, relaxing and challenging of the music rhythm, and the popular virtual cat game makes you can't stop, it really addictive!!!

POPCAT RULE:
All you need to do is feel the rhythm of the cute cat songs and control your 2 hands so the cats are all fed. Cute popcat all out fun meow~ ʕ≧ᴥ≦ʔ


Cats food is falling continuously! Can you feed them all?

CUTE KITTY CAT FEATURES:
1. Cat Sounds: Feed them and Popcat will sing to you with cute sounds. 😸
2. Cats food: A food store dedicated to your cute popcat 🐾
3. Upgrade Popcat: Various cute cats to collect at store food. 😻
4. Popular music: Cat noies - Remixes of popular songs with cute cat sounds.
5. Cat pictures: based on the famous meme - Popcat, cat sound music and cat cartoon concept game ..meow~ ʕ≧ᴥ≦ʔ

LET'S GO!!!
● Duet with all funny cats (Ф﹏Ф)
Not one but a duet! Your 2 funny cats (blackcat and cat kitty) are singing their adorable meow.. together into a hilarious ensemble. You can fatten them up by feeding them all the falling food. Oops, may they become obese?

● Simple but addictive with 2 hand control 👉👈
Left, right, and...center, with 2 hands. Use your hand and your observation to move through hundreds of levels of music rhythm falling. It's not easy, but if you get through it all, clap hands kittens

● A cats food store dedicated to your cute cats. Play songs with their voices, to get more food for them. The food store has sushi, candy cat, cake, ice cream cats... And you can shop for your cats, too.

● Various cute cats to collect 😻😼😺😸
If you're bored with the gray and white cat you started with, it's time to change its look! You can pick from many skins to change the cat breed: cute kitty charm, blackcat, monty cat, maru cat, dubstep cat, Chorley cat. Or turn your kitty cat into something completely different: spider cat, Pikachu cat and more, collect them all! These cute fluffy cats are yours. Upgrade your cute cats and feed them through DuetCats' musical challenges. This list goes on!

● Remixes of popular songs with sounds for cat
More than 1000 popular songs are waiting for you to unlock. With the latest version, Duet Cats has added many new, better and more fun songs. Join your cat in feeling that diva tune. Can you imagine what it would be like to combine with the “meowing” sound? I can not ??? Hurry up and be the first to hear it.

● Stories in Duet Cats. The cute cats told their ""hungry"" stories through the diva cat voice. Don't stop feeding the cute cats or they will get mad at you ~T.T~. And you don't forget have 2 funny cats

Are you someone who is looking for animal games or funny cats picture with a variety of music genres? Those who are looking for relaxing games, idle games, or role-playing games? Are you looking for more addictive games in this genre? Duet Cats is the perfect gift for you 🎁 🎁

Lead your popcat into shining diva cats like their meme.
